dialogue: HALT THIEF! You're under arrest for unlawful entry and theft!
Ouch those sirens are sure going to take a toll on my lovely ears.
OFFICERS! Don't let the thief get away!
Well then I hope your troopers are good with rooftops.
GIVE UP NOW WE HAVE YOU SURROUNDED!
Hey now, is the megaphone really necessary?
If it's distracting you, then I'm doing my job right!
If you don't stop this instant, I'll be forced to take drastic measures!
Aww you were going easy on me?
Alright then, FIRE THE NONLETHAL BULLETS!
Feeling tired yet?
Not at all! But thanks for your concern~
I'll show you concern!
Give us back the painting now!
Well what are you going to offer? A kiss?
How about more bullets?
I'm not going to give up!
Well stubborness is a part of your charm.
H-huh?
What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?
N-no! My gun got stuck!
You can't outrun justice!
Really? I've been doing a pretty good job so far.
CALLING NEARBY POLICE CARS! Check ahead and make sure to block all exits!
I guess I should stop strolling around.
You're never going to escape!
Save the sweet talk for the bedroom, honey.
YOU- Officers, I'm going on ahead!
Well that's my cue to speed up.
When I get my hands on you...
Oh Officer, what are you going to do to me?
GH- JUST YOU WAIT.
Too bad waiting's my not specialty.
W-what? There's a traffic accident on First Avenue?
Try another route! We can't let the thief get away!
Lucky me~ I can slow down.
Surrender and return what you stole immediately!
Are you talking about your heart?
wH- WH- NO! The painting!
Well that's a shame.
There's nowhere you can hide!
For you? There's nothing I will hide.
......I don't like a liar.
Reinforcements are coming!
All this just for little ol' me?
You're holding a painting worth tenfold my salary!
Looks like someone needs a raise.
What's it going to take for you to give up?
Just three words, and I'm yours.
You're under arrest.
How are you still going?
I can say the same to you.
...I won't stop.
Then the game goes on.
Enjoying the view back there?
We'll catch up to you eventually!
You're just delaying the inevitable.
Even if you catch me, you can't hold me for long.
